info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 4:29PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 515 PM MST... At 429 PM MST, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Desert Ridge Marketplace, or near Scottsdale, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Peoria, El Mirage, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Youngtown, Sun City, Piestewa Peak Park, Deer Valley Airport, Granite Reef Dam, Salt River Indian Community, North Mountain Park, Downtown Peoria, Downtown Scottsdale, Arrowhead Mall, Goldfield Ranch, Metro Center, and Scottsdale Airport. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 206 and 223. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 5 and 15. US Highway 60 between mile markers 145 and 151. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
